snippet.title: Kiss the Demiurge Trailer
snippet.description:
Kiss the Demiurge is a dramatic yuri visual novel. 
The story follows Minori, a mage who has been tasked with hiding magic from the world. One day she discovers a magic club at a local highschool, made up of three delusional girls who mistakenly believe themselves to have magic powers of their own. One is a graceful spirit medium who claims she can speak to ghosts, another is a shy fortune teller whose predictions are always wrong, and the so called leader is a tomboy who boasts that she's descended from a clan of magical samurai.
Minori sets out to stop the club members from discovering magic, but might just slowly find herself falling in love with them. 

store.steampowered.com/app/2098600/Kiss_the_Demiurge


We would like to thank Senkyu for providing her vocal talents for this trailer, in addition to the koesen voice agency.
voice-koesen.com
